HeroSection.title: Welcome to Imanis Cafeteria
HeroSection.subtitle: Enjoy freshly brewed coffee, pastries, well chosen dishes, and a warm, inviting atmosphere every day. Whether you’re craving a hearty breakfast, a light lunch, or an afternoon pick‑me‑up, our menu is crafted to delight your senses.

AboutUsSection.title: About Us
AboutUsSection.description: Imanis Cafeteria is a welcoming place located in Calpe, Spain, just steps from the sea, where we serve delicious coffee, pastries, and meals prepared with love. Our team is dedicated to providing you with a warm and inviting experience every time you visit.

PopularDishesSection.title: Popular Dishes
PopularDishesSection.description: Discover our chef’s top picks, crafted with seasonal ingredients and served fresh daily.

popularDish1.name: Seafood Paella
popularDish1.desc: Traditional Spanish rice dish with fresh seafood and saffron.

popularDish5.name: Macaroni Bolognese
popularDish5.desc: Classic Italian pasta dish with rich meat sauce.

popularDish2.name: Country Salad
popularDish2.desc: Fresh rucola mixed with radishes, cucumbers, cherry tomatoes, feta cheese and boiled eggs.

popularDish3.name: Salmon with Grilled Vegetables
popularDish3.desc: Grilled salmon served with seasonal vegetables.

popularDish4.name: English Breakfast
popularDish4.desc: Fried egg, bread, bacon sausage, cherry tomato and beans

TestimonialsSection.title: What Our Guests Say
TestimonialsSection.description: Real feedback from guests who love our café.

testimonial1.quote: Best coffee in town—cozy vibe and friendly staff!
testimonial1.author: — María G.

testimonial2.quote: The avocado toast is a revelation. Can’t wait to come back!
testimonial2.author: — Carlos R.

testimonial3.quote: Amazing pastries and so many vegan options!
testimonial3.author: — Lucia M.

testimonial4.quote: Perfect spot for a lazy Sunday brunch with friends.
testimonial4.author: — Javier L.

testimonial5.quote: The staff is so welcoming, it feels like home.
testimonial5.author: — Ana S.

testimonial6.quote: Their seasonal specials are always a treat!
testimonial6.author: — Diego P.

testimonial7.quote: I love the atmosphere here, perfect for working or relaxing.
testimonial7.author: — Elena T.

testimonial8.quote: The coffee art is almost too beautiful to drink!
testimonial8.author: — Sofia B.

GallerySection.title: Gallery
GallerySection.description: Explore our cozy atmosphere and delicious offerings through our gallery.

section1.title: Imanis Cafeteria
section1.description: A cozy spot serving artisanal coffee, fresh pastries, and homemade treats. Join us for a relaxing experience.
